title: Decrease amount of CaO in CaCO3 equilibrium

content.question: The reaction system represented above is at equilibrium. Which of the following will decrease the amount of CaO(s) in the system?

choices.label: Increasing the volume of the reaction vessel at constant temperature
Lowering the temperature of the system
Removing some CO2(g) at constant temperature
Removing some CaCO3(s) at constant temperature

content.answer: Lowering the temperature of the system

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
